gnu.crypto.tool
Class SaslC

java.lang.Object
  gnu.crypto.tool.SaslC
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.lang.Runnable
public class SaslC
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Runnable

A basic client-side test class to exercise SASL mechanisms.

The main() method accepts two arguments: the first is the number of threads, and the second is the port number on which the (local) server is listening.

Version:
$Revision: 1.1 $

Method Detail

main

public static void main(java.lang.String[] args)
                 throws java.lang.Exception
Simple test client that connects to the test server over SASL connections.

Parameters:
args - [0] the name of the SASL mechanism to exercise; [1] the number of working threads to exercise simultaneously; and [2] port number where to connect to the server.

java.lang.Exception
